programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Que Assim Seja, Trinity, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Um aventureiro protege um garoto que herdou um terreno sob o qual há um rico campo de petróleo. O menino é ameaçado por vilões perigosos que querem prejudicá-lo e tomar a terra.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Um Certo Capitão Lockhart, (2018, Western)
programme.desc: Will Lockhart chega a Coronado, no Novo México, procurando os responsáveis pela morte de seu irmão caçula, assassinado por Apaches incomumente armados com rifles.

programme.title: Onde os Homens São Homens, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: No início do século XX John McCabe, homem de passado misterioso, vai até um remoto povoado do oeste americano para montar o primeiro prostíbulo da comunidade.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infância Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan é um oficial de polícia e a relação entre ambos não será nada fácil. Catlow é um ladrão, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vendê-lo em Abilene.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Assassinato em Sparrow Creek, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um antigo policial que agora trabalha como miliciano investiga um tiroteio que aconteceu em seu bairro. Porém, tudo fica mais complicado quando ele descobre que alguém da sua própria milícia pode ter sido o responsável.

programme.title: A Cura de Todo Mal, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Johnny é um carismático pregador, que viaja ao lado de sua namorada por todos os Estados Unidos, visitando igrejas e enganando as pessoas ao dizer que possui poderes de cura, até o dia em que ele descobre que os seus poderes são reais.

programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma bomba é colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rápido do mundo e explodirá caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Por amor ou por dinheiro, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: Um romance de conto de fadas toma um rumo inesperado quando Mark descobre que sua bela noiva, Connie, está planejando roubá-lo. Para não ser tolo, Mark embarca em uma missão para ver até onde Connie irá roubar seu dinheiro.

programme.title: Uma Última Vez, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer é um dentista solitário na Flórida. Quando confrontado por uma figura do passado trazendo notícias, ele precisa embarcar em uma jornada de descobertas fantásticas e também desesperadoras, que vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Pegadas na neve, (2020, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O perigo ronda uma montanha de neve. Cinco pessoas exploram uma região nos alpes em busca de uma planta com propriedades medicinais.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: Mar Negro, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma estranha contaminação atinge uma pequena vila de pescadores. Quando peixes e crustáceos se transformam em horrendas criaturas transmissoras de morte e destruição.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.title: Uma mulher misteriosa aparece diante de Sesshomaru. Sara foi trazida de volta à vida e roubou a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e transformou Mirok e Sango em estátuas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.title: Mushin, a pessoa que criou Mirok, vai morrer. Eles perguntam a Mushin o que ele quer para que eles possam lhe dar um último presente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um ancestral de Hojo está em uma jornada para oferecer a herança da família Hojo, uma espada demoníaca. Inuyasha e seu grupo o acompanham.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Nome do Ancestral é Agome

programme.title: Polnareff é atacado por um exército de zumbis após descobrir que a velhinha responsável pelo hotel é uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados enfrentam um assassino cruel, que segue as ordens de DIO para matar sem um pingo de hesitação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin e Polnareff descobrem um Stand inimigo capaz de atacar as células cerebrais quando mandam seus Stands para a cabeça de Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados atravessam um deserto em que o Sol nunca se põe e a temperatura aumenta a níveis insuportáveis.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin sonha com um parque de diversões onde se ouve o choro de um bebê. De volta ao mundo real, um bebê aparece como passageiro do avião em que está a equipe de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ninguém leva a preocupação de Kakyoin com o bebê a sério, mas a verdade logo vem à tona quando eles vão parar no mundo dos pesadelos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o pai de Avdol em uma ilha remota, mas o homem vive sozinho e não quer contato com ninguém. Polnareff descobre uma lâmpada estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand que surge da lâmpada atende ao terceiro desejo de Polnareff e ressuscita Avdol, mas o ex-defunto só quer saber de acabar com o autor do desejo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando precisam sair do submarino e escapar do Stand inimigo, Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o que parecem ser dois túneis embaixo d'água.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Um helicóptero aterrissa na frente de Jotaro e seu grupo no Egito, mas não parece trazer a ajuda que Joseph pediu.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 1

programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Khnum do Ongo e o Thoth do Bongo

programme.title: Um jovem chamado Chaka tem uma mudança súbita de personalidade depois de encontrar uma espada misteriosa. Jotaro e seu grupo viajam para o Cairo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff percebe que a espada de Chaka é um Stand quando é atacado por seu barbeiro. O problema é que a espada está mais poderosa desde a última luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados chegam à cidade de Luxor, e Joseph leva um choque ao tocar uma estranha pedra com uma tomada elétrica.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Avdol ficam presos um ao outro por causa do Stand inimigo. Quando eles finalmente conseguem se separar, acabam prendendo os pés em um trilho de trem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente após tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff, numa versão criança, precisa enfrentar o usuário de Stand Alessi contando apenas com seu minúsculo Stand. Na hora H, ele recorre a uma solução impensável.

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo finalmente chegam ao Cairo. Eles encontram um homem que diz saber onde fica a mansão de DIO, mas ele se recusa a dar esta informação de graça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro demonstra suas habilidades com o Stand antes de começar uma partida de pôquer com D’Arby como aviso para que ninguém trapaceie.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Avdol procura informações sobre a mansão de DIO no Cairo. Iggy enfrenta dois cães ameaçadores durante um passeio pela cidade.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 1

programme.title: Iggy foge para o rio após se ferir gravemente na luta contra Petto Shoppu, mas não dá sinais de que vai desistir.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo são recebidos na porta da mansão de DIO por um mordomo chamado D’Arby, que alega ser irmão mais novo de D’Arby, o apostador.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin perde a alma em um jogo de corrida contra D’Arby. Joseph escolhe um jogo que é a especialidade do mordomo e leva uma bronca de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo estranhando as atitudes de Jotaro, D'Arby se mantém confiante graças ao Stand. Avdol e os outros entram na mansão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 1

programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 2

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 3

programme.title: Polnareff finalmente enfrenta DIO, mas não consegue se aproximar. De longe, ele libera sua arma secreta para revelar o Stand de seu terrível oponente.

programme.title: Kakyoin quer revelar a identidade do Stand de DIO, e para isso usa seu próprio Stand em um ataque concentrado.

programme.title: DIO usa seu Stand e consegue parar o tempo, mas quando vai atacar, percebe que os dedos de Jotaro estão se mexendo. Quem vencerá esta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO contempla sua vitória. Enfurecido, Jotaro enfrenta seu inimigo em uma batalha final. O cenário? Um mundo em que o tempo está congelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O adeus da longa jornada, amigos

programme.title: Pequenos Espiões 4, (2011, Children)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson é casada com Wilbur, um repórter conhecido por desmascarar espiões, e com ele tem um bebê e duas crianças. O que o marido não sabe é que a esposa é uma ex-espiã, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar à família.

programme.title: Clockstoppers: O Filme, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Zak Gibbs (Jesse Bradford, "Hackers") é um adolescente normal que consegue poderes extraordinários após encontrar um relógio misterioso que pode parar o tempo!

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso, (2020, Adventure)

programme.title: Meu Amigo Ninja, (2018, Children)

programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Crime)

programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission – until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Luffy and his mates cross paths with a ragged gang of sailors. The Straw Hats are quick to offer assistance, but their new friends may be up to no good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Band of Pirates! Sunny and the Dangerous Trap!

programme.title: The Straw Hats discover that their fishermen friends are actually pirates, but Chopper refuses to abandon a very sick patient.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sunny in a Pinch! Roar, Secret Superspeed Mecha!

programme.title: The captain of the Phoenix Pirates loses his will to fight, and the Straw Hats get trapped in a field of icebergs by some figure skating bounty hunters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Dream Sinking in the New World! The Disillusioned Pirate, Puzzle!

programme.title: Nami and Franky take a spin in the shark sub, Usopp and Sanji have a run in with a flock of deadly penguins, and Puzzle can no longer hide the fact that he's alive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Assassins Attack! The Great Battle on Ice Begins!

programme.title: Robin is shocked by her encounter with an adorable bounty hunter, Franky and Nami get trapped in a frozen shark, and Luffy's quest to recapture his flag sends him sinking toward the bottom of the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Staw Hat’s Hard Battles! A Pirate Soul Risking It All for the Flag!

programme.title: Luffy battles a set of magnetic twins, Sanji and Usopp fall victim to a pair of figure skating lovebirds, and Zoro has a drink with the man who stole the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hot Full Throttle! The Twin’s Magnetic Power Drawing Near!

programme.title: Robin's cola care package helps spring her friends from an icy prison, and Luffy's bold words inspire a battered and beaten pirate to keep fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mansion of Great Chaos! The Enraged Don and the Captured Crew!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his battle with the magnetic twins, Chopper uses a rumble ball in his battle with a hockey player – and Robin tries to recover the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Phoenix! The Dream of the Pirate Flag Sworn to a Friend!

programme.title: Luffy battles an opponent who's too hot to handle, Robin gets attacked by a jungle, and Chopper makes a heroic dash for the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Red Hot Decisive Battle! Luffy vs. The Scorching Don!

programme.title: Luffy's red-hot battle with Papa threatens to destroy the entire icy island, and the rest of the Straw Hats need a little help from a former enemy to recover their flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Brave Pirates!

programme.title: The most adorable hero the world has ever known – Chopperman – must battle a hideously evil villain to regain control of his favorite television station!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopperman to the Rescue! Protect the TV Station by the Shore!

programme.title: While sailing through haunted waters, the Straw Hats encounter a ghost ship that's home to a walking, talking skeleton!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE MYSTERIOUS SKELETON FLOATING THROUGH THE FOG! VENTURE INTO THE DEVIL'S SEA!

programme.title: The Straw Hats attempt to unravel the mystery of their new comrade, but the skeleton's sad story is interrupted by a ghastly landing at the haunted island of Thriller Bark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE JOY OF SEEING PEOPLE! THE GENTLEMAN SKELETON'S TRUE IDENTITY!

programme.title: After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ONE UNNATURAL PHENOMENON AFTER THE NEXT! DISEMBARKING ON THRILLER BARK!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Usopp get scared out of their minds when they encounter a graveyard full of zombies! Meanwhile, the rest of the crew gets trapped in super creepy sea web!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE MAN CALLED A GENIUS! HOGBACK MAKES HIS APPEARANCE!

programme.title: An invisible man turns Nami's bath time into a harrowing experience, and Usopp battles a hall full of haunted paintings with a handful of burning candles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NAMI'S IN A MAJOR PINCH! THE ZOMBIE MANSION AND THE INVISIBLE MAN

programme.title: While Usopp, Nami, and Chopper seek to unravel the secrets of the haunted mansion, Luffy and the gang do battle with an army of the undead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ZOMBIE'S SECRET! HOGBACK'S NIGHTMARISH LABORATORY

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsène Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsène Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant…
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Daré had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: In Old California, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: King of the Cowboys, (1943, Action)
programme.desc: Saboteurs are blowing up government warehouses (during World War II). Roy and his pals work undercover to put an end to their operations.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine might in fact have hidden gold deposits. Leave it to Roy to find out the truth!

programme.title: San Fernando Valley, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A ranch owner fires his ranch hands and brings in women to replace them. The owner's daughter wants the male hands back and comes up with a plan to do it. They will rustle the horses and bring the men in to get their old jobs back.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Penelope, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: She's young, she's rich, she's available - too bad she has a pig's nose. Christina Ricci and James McAvoy team in a modern fairy tale about finding perfect love, imperfections and all.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.desc: Now a rising lawyer, Elle Woods is about to make partner at her firm, she and Emmett are still love, and her hair is still healthy. Elle heads to D.C. and take matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Serendipity, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Bekinsale) meet unexpectedly, but part ways, determining that fate will guide their future if they're meant to be together.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller stars as Eddie, the 40-year-old confirmed bachelor who finally says "I do" to the beautiful and Lila. But during their honeymoon, the woman of his dreams turns out to be a total nightmare.

programme.desc: Rosalee, star-struck small-town girl, wins a date with the Hollywood hunk Tad Hamilton. And while it may be Rosalee's dream-come-true, it means complete chaos for her best friend Pete.

programme.desc: A look at the mental health crisis that sweeps mountain towns.

programme.title: Skamtinden
programme.desc: Nikolai Schirmer and crew ski the Norwegian mountains of Nállangáisi, Skamtinden, and Jiehkkevárri.

programme.title: Rewa: Conservation Through Fly Fishing
programme.desc: The people of Guyana's Rewa Village work with fisherman to use catch and release fly fishing.

programme.title: Explorers

programme.title: Explorers

programme.title: Ascend
